thread.title: Jennifer McCrary

author: Jennifer McCrary
title: Jennifer McCrary
text: I ordered 4 theater chairs a few months ago and have continued to receive great service. One of the chairs arrived damaged and the accessory was missing. I called but was told it would probably be the following week before I received. Response as it was the weekend. I immediately received a call from John who assisted me with my issues. I emailed John again this week because one of the lights in the cup holder stopped working. He immediately ordered me another one and is scheduling a tech to come help me. Great service! The chairs are great too!
